description: Ministry of Public Administration and Home Affairs - Order to extend the Period of expressing preference to widowers' and Orphang's Pension Scheme under clause 3 (6)(a) and (b) of widowers' and Orphans Pesion Act. No. 28 of 1983 and under chause 5(a) of School Teachers' Pension Act No. 44 of 1953 - Directire unded Clause 10 of the widow' and Orphans Pension Fund (Revised) Act No. 8 of 2010 and Clause 9 of Public Administration and Home Affairs.
